price: Nabiyyii kamiifuu booji’amtoonni isaaf ta’uun isaaf hin malu, hanga lafa irratti injifatutti (ajjeechaa isaanii bakkaan gahutti). Isin meeshaa (faa’idaa) addunyaa feetu; Rabbiin immoo Aakhiraa (isiniif) fedha, Rabbiin injifataa, ogeessa.
arabic: مَا كَانَ لِنَبِيٍّ أَن يَكُونَ لَهُۥٓ أَسۡرَىٰ حَتَّىٰ يُثۡخِنَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ تُرِيدُونَ عَرَضَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: mā kāna linabiyyin an yakūna lahu asrā ḥattā yuth'khina fī al-arḍi turīdūna ʿaraḍa al-dun'yā wal-lahu yurīdu al-ākhirata wal-lahu ʿazīzun ḥakīmun
